comment: If a singleton is a subclass of another class, then the singleton's element is an element of that other class. This theorem is the right-to-left implication of the biconditional ~ snss . The proof of this theorem was automatically generated from ~ snsslVD using a tools command file, translateMWO.cmd, by translating the proof into its non-virtual deduction form and minimizing it. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 25-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
